overview: A group of young people come together for an early summer weekend by the sea. They are drama school graduates and a tightly knit group about to be broken up. The last three years they have been together day and night. Now they are on the threshold of new lives as professionals - competing for the same parts.
tagline: Friends. Enemies. Parties. Craziness. Saltwater. Hangovers. Outhouse. Live well.
title: Play
